text: language notes topic 9 internet and text
chat slang part 2 abbreviations acronyms
and shorthand now we'll focus on
abbreviations and symbols that are
commonly used on the internet and in
texting I'm going to show you 10
statements messages I'll give you a
moment to read a message to yourself and
then we'll read it together here's the
first text message do you understand the
person is texting I can't meet you now
I'm at a birthday party let's talk later
you at birthday later here's our second
text message
the person is texting for your
information my new cell phone my new
cell phone number is 555 one two three
four okay fYI some people actually say
fYI in conversation cell can be short
for cell phone in texting people might
simply use okay of course you'll also
see okay which is a little more common
before okay I think you're ready for a
challenge so here's our third text
message
do you understand all of it a person is
texting a friend saying stop all the DIY
that do-it-yourself projects in my
humble opinion you need some R&R some
rest and relaxation hugs and kisses your
BFF your best friend forever a
do-it-yourself project is commonly some
kind of home improvement project IMH o
stands for in my humble opinion you'll
also see it without the H in my opinion
you and your are fairly easy to
recognize R&R is usually said as R&R it
stands for rest and relaxation often
you'll see xoxo which stands for hugs
and kisses sometimes to express more
love and more affection you'll see
xoxoxo and onward and onward XXX oh oh
BFF like these are often read with just
the letters BFF DIY R&R BFF stands for
best friend forever but you'll hear
people use BFF he's my BFF
she is my BFF we're BFFs here's our
fourth message do you understand all of
it someone is texting I need to see you
ASAP
as soon as possible we must talk
face-to-face please see you could appear
in a statement or it could be used as a
sign off a closing like see you see you
later
ASAP stands for as soon as possible
and some people when speaking even say
ASAP okay F - f stands for face to face
this is an abbreviation for please
here's our fifth text message a person
is texting by the way John is coming
with sue to the party oh my god
this stands for by the way with oMG
often written in capital letters with an
exclamation point is an expression of
surprise oh my god here's our sixth text
message does it all make sense there's
an interruption here
BRB stands for be right back so the
person wanted to respond but couldn't
need it to step away and then return now
the person continues the message sorry
I'm working 24/7 meaning I'm working 24
hours a day seven days a week
around-the-clock on working 24/7 these
days I have little time to talk you
understand
lol lol laughing out loud here's our
seventh message
this is a quick request for information
a person is texting can you tell me the
date month and year Thanks you might
even see DD mm YY on forms they want you
to supply a date a month in a year we
have just a few more messages to look at
here's number 8 this is a text message
from a busy person a message sent home
just a sec interruption continuation
sorry I was in a meeting I don't know
what time I'll be home today probably
late SEC for second
idk stands for I don't know MTG is a
common abbreviation for meeting and the
rest should be understood here's our
ninth message
do you understand it all a person is
texting
what's your apartment number I'm leaving
in five minutes you've seen this one
before your apt apartment number mi n is
a very common abbreviation for minutes
here's our tenth and final message do
you understand it
a person is texting I need to talk to
you about or regarding weekend plans and
a doctor's appointment you've seen this
you our e stands for regarding sometimes
in texting people use our e in place of
about this you've seen in R&R rest and
relaxation the ampersand stands for and
dr is short for doctor usually as a
title we abbreviate dr. as capital d
lowercase R and a PPT some people use as
an abbreviation for appointment but be
careful this is a PPT and another
message we saw a PT which was short for
apartment again I need to talk to you
about or regarding weekend plans and a
doctor's appointment
that's all for now I hope you found it
useful to look at some internet slang
and text abbreviations remember though
what I said about having good writing
habits and affording poor ones thanks
for watching and happy studies
please visit my website today at WWE
glitch with Jennifer comm you'll find
study tips interactive exercises
vocabulary videos and more
